definitions.definition: A diurnal predatory bird of the family Accipitridae , smaller than an eagle .
examples: It is illegal to hunt hawks or other raptors in many parts of the world.

definitions.definition: Any diurnal predatory terrestrial bird of similar size and appearance to the accipitrid hawks, such as a falcon .
( entomology ) Any of various species of dragonfly of the genera Apocordulia and Austrocordulia , endemic to Australia.
( politics ) An advocate of aggressive political positions and actions. [from 1962]

( game theory ) An uncooperative or purely selfish participant in an exchange or game, especially when untrusting , acquisitive or treacherous . Refers specifically to the prisoner's dilemma , a.k.a. the Hawk-Dove game.
( US , especially Chicago , and nationwide in African-American , often with "the" ) Cold , sharp or biting wind .

main_definition: A diurnal predatory bird of the family Accipitridae , smaller than an eagle .
secondary_definitions: Any diurnal predatory terrestrial bird of similar size and appearance to the accipitrid hawks, such as a falcon .
( entomology ) Any of various species of dragonfly of the genera Apocordulia and Austrocordulia , endemic to Australia.
( politics ) An advocate of aggressive political positions and actions. [from 1962]

( game theory ) An uncooperative or purely selfish participant in an exchange or game, especially when untrusting , acquisitive or treacherous . Refers specifically to the prisoner's dilemma , a.k.a. the Hawk-Dove game.
( US , especially Chicago , and nationwide in African-American , often with "the" ) Cold , sharp or biting wind .

definitions.definition: A plasterer 's tool , made of a flat surface with a handle below, used to hold an amount of plaster prior to application to the wall or ceiling being worked on: a mortarboard .

main_definition: A plasterer 's tool , made of a flat surface with a handle below, used to hold an amount of plaster prior to application to the wall or ceiling being worked on: a mortarboard .

definitions.definition: A noisy effort to force up phlegm from the throat.

main_definition: A noisy effort to force up phlegm from the throat.
